```{r}
fake_df <- readRDS(here::here('sandbox', 'student', 'fake.RDS'))

DT::datatable(head(fake_df))
```

## S_14_missing_birthdate

```{r}
s_14_test_values <- head(fake_df, 20) %>% 
  mutate(birth_date = ifelse(as.integer(student_id) %% 2 == 0, NA, birth_date)) 
```

```{r}
s_14_missing_birthdate <- s_14_test_values %>% 
  mutate(s_14_missing_birthdate = is.na(birth_date)) %>% 
  mutate(s_14_missing_birthdate_activity_date = spbpers_activity_date) %>% 
  mutate(s_14_missing_birthdate_age = spbpers_activity_date_days_past)
```

```{r}
datatable(s_14_missing_birthdate)
```
